tables.name: cosmos_chains_registry
tables.description: The Cosmos chains registry table provides a comprehensive list of chains within the Cosmos ecosystem, including their name, ID, status, and other relevant details. This table serves as a reference point for developers and users to explore the various chains supported by the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: chain_name
columns.description: Blockchain network name identifier

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique chain identifier (e.g. public key, hash)

columns.name: status
columns.description: Blockchain network status (online, offline, etc.)

columns.name: network_type
columns.description: Type of blockchain network (public, private, etc.)

columns.name: bech32_prefix
columns.description: Human-readable prefix for addresses on the blockchain network

columns.name: github_repo
columns.description: Link to the blockchain network's GitHub repository

columns.name: last_refresh
columns.description: Timestamp for the last updated data from the blockchain network

columns.name: ingestion_date
columns.description: Date and time the data was ingested into the registry

tables.name: cosmwasm_github_analysis
tables.description: Cosmos-Blockchain GitHub Analysis: This table provides insights into the GitHub repositories that are leveraging CosmWasm, a framework for building smart contracts on the Cosmos blockchain. It includes metrics such as repository popularity and CosmWasm usage.

columns.name: month
columns.description: Month of data collection in calendar format (YYYY-MM)

columns.name: owner
columns.description: Address owner of CosmWasm repository on GitHub

columns.name: repo_name
columns.description: Name of CosmWasm repository on GitHub

columns.name: file_path
columns.description: Path to files within CosmWasm GitHub repository

columns.name: stars
columns.description: Number of GitHub stars received by CosmWasm repository

columns.name: watchers
columns.description: Number of GitHub watchers for CosmWasm repository

columns.name: forks
columns.description: Number of GitHub forks for CosmWasm repository

columns.name: cosmwasm
columns.description: CosmWasm smart contract interaction or event data

tables.name: cosmwasm_penetration_analysis
tables.description: This table provides an analysis of CosmWasm penetration in the Cosmos ecosystem, showcasing key metrics on contract deployments and economic impact over time.

columns.name: date
columns.description: Activity timestamp, representing date of blockchain network activity

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the specific Cosmos blockchain network

columns.name: day_deployments
columns.description: Number of CosmWasm smart contracts deployed on a given day

columns.name: day_instantiations
columns.description: Number of CosmWasm smart contracts instantiated on a given day

columns.name: economic_impact
columns.description: Estimated economic impact of CosmWasm smart contracts on the network

tables.name: cosmwasm_traffic_analysis
tables.description: Cosmos Ecosystem Blockchain Traffic Analysis Data - This data provides insights into the traffic generated by smart contracts in the Cosmos ecosystem. It offers a comprehensive view of the transaction patterns on various blockchain chains.

columns.name: date
columns.description: Date transactions were recorded on the blockchain in UTC timezone

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the blockchain network within the Cosmos ecosystem

columns.name: contract
columns.description: Address of the smart contract interacting with the blockchain

columns.name: n_txns
columns.description: Number of transactions processed on the blockchain network

columns.name: n_calls
columns.description: Number of contract function calls made via CosmWasm

columns.name: fee_amount
columns.description: Total fees charged for processing transactions on the network

tables.name: cosmwasm_users_analysis
tables.description: This table contains user analysis data from various blockchain chains in the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides insights into the activities of different users across multiple chains.

columns.name: date
columns.description: Timestamp recording the occurrence or update of the blockchain event

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier representing a specific blockchain network within Cosmos

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Public address associated with the account initiating a transaction or action
